info.title: Lead provider API - 3.0.0
info.description: The lead provider API for DfE's manage teacher CPD service.

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve delivery partners

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine delivery partners to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of delivery partners.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort delivery partners being returned.

200.description: Successfully return a list of delivery partners

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve a specific delivery partner

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the delivery partner

200.description: Successfully return a specific delivery partner

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve multiple ECF partnerships

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine partnerships to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of partnerships.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort partnerships being returned.

post.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Create an ECF partnership with a school and delivery partner

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Get a single ECF partnership

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the partnership

put.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Update a partnership’s delivery partner in an existing partnership in a cohort

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the partnership to update

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve multiple ECF schools scoped to cohort

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine schools to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of schools.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort schools being returned.

200.description: A list of schools for the given cohort

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Get a single ECF school scoped to cohort

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the school

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine schools to return.

get.summary: Retrieve multiple NPQ applications

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine NPQ applications to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of NPQ applications.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort NPQ applications being returned.

get.summary: Get a single NPQ application

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the NPQ application.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the NPQ application to accept.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the NPQ application to reject.

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
List all participant NPQ outcomes

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine participant outcomes to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of participant NPQ outcomes.

get.summary: Retrieve NPQ outcomes for the specified participant

parameters.name: participant_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the participant

parameters.name: participant_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the participant

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Get a single NPQ participant

parameters.description: The ID of the NPQ participant.

Notify that an NPQ participant is changing training schedule

Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Notify that an NPQ participant is taking a break from their course

Notify that an NPQ participant is resuming their course

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
List all participant declarations

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine participant declarations to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of participant declarations.

post.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Declare a participant has reached a milestone. Idempotent endpoint - submitting exact copy of a request will return the same response body as submitting it the first time.

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Get single participant declaration

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the participant declaration ID

put.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Void a declaration - it will not be soft-deleted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the declaration to void

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Retrieve multiple participants, replaces /api/v3/participants

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine ECF participants to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of ECF participants.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort ECF participants being returned.

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
Get a single ECF participant

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the ECF participant.

Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve multiple unfunded mentors

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve financial statements

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Refine statements to return.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination options to navigate through the list of statements.

200.description: A list of statements as part of which the DfE will make output payments for ecf or npq participants

get.summary:
Note, this endpoint is new.
Retrieve specific financial statement

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the statement

BadOrMissingParametersResponse.description: Request was missing data or contained invalid data

bad_or_missing_parameters.description: An error message for each bad or missing attribute describing the problems

errors.title: Bad request
errors.detail: correct json data structure required. See API docs for reference

bad_request.description: An error message for bad request

id.description: The unique identifier of the delivery partner

DeliveryPartnerAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with a delivery partner

name.description: The name of the delivery partner you are working with

cohort.description: The cohorts for which you may report school partnerships with this delivery partner

created_at.description: The date the delivery partner was created

updated_at.description: The date the delivery partner was last updated

DeliveryPartnerCohortError.description: Not a delivery partner you have a relationship with for this cohort

enum: Not a delivery partner you have a relationship with for this cohort
title.example: Not a delivery partner you have a relationship with for this cohort

detail.description: Additional info on which cohorts are available
detail.example: Delivery partner is available for 2021 cohort only

DeliveryPartnersFilter.description: Filter delivery partners to return more specific results

cohort.description: Return delivery partners from the specified cohort or cohorts. This is a comma delimited string of years.

ECFDeferral.description: The details of an ECF Participant deferral

reason.description: The reason a participant was deferred

date.description: The date and time the participant was deferred

ECFEnrolment.description: The details of an ECF Participant enrolment

training_record_id.description: The unique identifier of the participant training record. Should the DfE dedupe a participant, this value will not change.

email.description: The email address registered for this ECF participant

mentor_id.description: The unique identifier of this ECF participants mentor

school_urn.description: The Unique Reference Number (URN) of the school that submitted this ECF participant

participant_type.description: The type of ECF participant this record refers to

cohort.description: Indicates which call-off contract funds this participant's training. 2021 indicates a participant that has started, or will start, their training in the 2021/22 academic year.

training_status.description: The training status of the ECF participant

participant_status.description: Replaces the old status field. Indicates if a SIT has advised DfE of a transfer or a withdrawal of the participant from the school

teacher_reference_number_validated.description: Indicates whether the Teacher Reference Number (TRN) has been validated

eligible_for_funding.description: Indicates whether this participant is eligible to receive DfE funded induction

pupil_premium_uplift.description: Indicates whether this participant qualifies for an uplift payment due to pupil premium

sparsity_uplift.description: Indicates whether this participant qualifies for an uplift payment due to sparsity

schedule_identifier.description: The schedule of the ECF participant. For the possible values please refer to the ECF schedules and milestone dates guidance.

delivery_partner_id.description: Unique ID of the delivery partner associated with the participant

created_at.description: The date and time the ECF participant was created

induction_end_date.description: The ECF participant induction completion date

mentor_funding_end_date.description: The ECF participant mentor training completion date

cohort_changed_after_payments_frozen.description: Identify participants that migrated to a new cohort as payments were frozen on their original cohort

ParticipantIdChange.description: The details of an Participant ID change

from_participant_id.description: The unique identifier of the changed from participant training record.

to_participant_id.description: The unique identifier of the changed to participant training record.

changed_at.description: The date and time the Participant ID change

ECFParticipant.description:
Note, this endpoint includes updated specifications.
The details of a participant

id.description: The unique identifier of the participant record

ECFParticipantAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with an ECF participant

full_name.description: The full name of this ECF participant

teacher_reference_number.description: The Teacher Reference Number (TRN) for this participant

updated_at.description: The date and time the ECF participant was last updated

ecf_enrolments.description: Information about the course(s) the participant is enroled in

participant_id_changes.description: Information about the Participant ID changes

ECFParticipantChangeSchedule.description: An ECF participant change schedule action

ECFParticipantChangeScheduleAttributes.description: An ECF participant change schedule action

schedule_identifier.description: The new schedule of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

cohort.description: Providers may not change the current value for ECF participants. Indicates which call-off contract funds this participant's training. 2021 indicates a participant that has started, or will start, their training in the 2021/22 academic year.

ECFParticipantChangeScheduleRequest.description: The change schedule request for a participant

ECFParticipantDeclarationAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with a participant declaration response

participant_id.description: The unique id of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

state.description: Indicates the state of this payment declaration

updated_at.description: The date the declaration was last updated

created_at.description: The date the declaration was created

delivery_partner_id.description: Unique ID of the delivery partner associated with the participant at the time the declaration was created

statement_id.description: Unique ID of the statement the declaration will be paid as part of

clawback_statement_id.description: Unique id of the statement to which the declaration will be clawed back on, if any

ineligible_for_funding_reason.description: If the declaration is ineligible, the reason why

mentor_id.description: Unique ID of the ECT's mentor

uplift_paid.description: If participant is eligible for uplift, whether it has been paid as part of this declaration

evidence_held.description: The type of evidence that the lead provider holds on their platform to demonstrate that the participant has met the retention criteria for the current milestone period

has_passed.description: Whether the participant has failed or passed

lead_provider_name.description: The name of the provider that submitted the declaration

participant_id.description: The unique ID of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

evidence_held.description: The type of evidence that the lead provider holds on their platform to demonstrate that the participant has met the retention criteria for the current milestone period

participant_id.description: The unique ID of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

evidence_held.description: The type of evidence that the lead provider holds on their platform to demonstrate that the participant has met the retention criteria for the current milestone period

id.description: The unique identifier of the participant declaration record

participant_id.description: The unique ID of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

evidence_held.description: The type of evidence that the lead provider holds on their platform to demonstrate that the participant has met the retention criteria for the current milestone period

participant_id.description: The unique ID of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

ECFParticipantDefer.description: The details of a participant deferral request

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

ECFParticipantDeferRequest.description: The deferral request for a participant

ECFParticipantTransfer.description: Note, this is a new endpoint. The details of an ECF participant transfer

id.description: The unique identifier of the participant record

ECFParticipantTransferAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with an ECF participant transfer

updated_at.description: The date and time the latest ECF participant was last updated

ECFParticipantTransfers.description: The details of an ECF Participant enrolment

training_record_id.description: The unique identifier of the participant training record

transfer_type.description: The type of transfer between schools

status.description: The status of the transfer, if both leaving and joining SIT have completed their journeys or only one has

created_at.description: The date and time the ECF participant transfer was created

ECFParticipantJoining.description: The details of an ECF Participant joining a school

school_urn.description: The URN of the school the participant is joining

provider.description: The name of the provider the participant is joining

date.description: The date the participant will be joining the school

ECFParticipantLeaving.description: The details of an ECF Participant leaving a school

school_urn.description: The URN of the school the participant is leaving

provider.description: The name of the provider the participant is leaving

date.description: The date the participant will be leaving the school

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

ECFParticipantResumeRequest.description: The resume request for a participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

ECFParticipantWithdrawRequest.description: The withdrawal request for a participant

id.description: The unique identifier of the partnership

cohort.description: The cohort for which you are reporting the partnership

delivery_partner_id.description: The unique ID of the delivery partner you will work with for this school partnership

school_id.description: The Unique ID of the school you are partnering with

ECFPartnershipAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with an ECF partnership

cohort.description: The cohort for which you are reporting the partnership

urn.description: The Unique Reference Number (URN) of the school you are partnered with

school_id.description: The unique ID of the school you are partnered with

delivery_partner_id.description: The unique ID of the delivery partner you are working with for this partnership

delivery_partner_name.description: The name of the delivery partner you are working with for this partnership

status.description: The status of the partnership which includes active or challenged

challenged_reason.description: If the partnership has been challenged, the reason provided for the challenge by the SIT

challenged_at.description: The date the partnership has been challenged

induction_tutor_name.description: The name of the induction tutor at the school you are in partnership with

induction_tutor_email.description: The email address of the induction tutor at the school you are in partnership with

updated_at.description: The date the partnership was last updated

created_at.description: The date the partnership was reported by you

delivery_partner_id.description: The unique ID of the delivery partner you will work with for this school partnership

id.description: The unique identifier of the school

ECFSchoolAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with an ECF school

urn.description: The Unique Reference Number (URN) of the school

cohort.description: Indicates which call-off contract funds this participant's training. 2021 indicates a participant that has started, or will start, their training in the 2021/22 academic year.

in_partnership.description: Whether or not the school already has an active partnership, if it is doing a funded induction programme

induction_programme_choice.description: The induction programme the school offers

created_at.description: The date and time the school was created

updated_at.description: The last time a change was made to this school record by the DfE

ECFSchoolsFilter.description: Filter schools to return more specific results

cohort.description: Return schools within the specified cohort.

urn.description: Return a school with the specified Unique Reference Number (URN).

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

MultipleECFSchoolsResponse.description: A list of schools for the given cohort

ECFWithdrawal.description: The details of an ECF Participant withdrawal

reason.description: The reason a participant was withdrawn

date.description: The date and time the participant was withdrawn

ListFilter.description: Filter a list of records to return more specific results

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

ListFilterDeclarations.description: Filter a list of declarations records to return more specific results

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

participant_id.description: The unique id of the participant

NPQApplication.description: The details of an NPQ Application

id.description: The unique identifier of the NPQ Application record

NPQApplicationAlreadyAccepted.description: NPQ Application has already been accepted

enum: NPQ Application has already been accepted
title.example: NPQ Application has already been accepted

detail.example: You cannot accept this NPQ application as it has already been accepted

NPQApplicationChangedFromRejected.description: Once rejected an application cannot change state

enum: Once rejected an application cannot change state
title.example: Once rejected an application cannot change state

detail.example: You cannot accept this NPQ application as it has already been rejected

schedule_identifier.description: The new schedule of the participant

NPQApplicationAcceptDataRequest.description: The NPQ Application acceptance request attributes

NPQApplicationAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with an NPQ application

participant_id.description: The unique identifier of this NPQ participant

full_name.description: The full name of this NPQ participant

email.description: The email address registered for this NPQ participant

email_validated.description: Indicates whether the email address has been validated

teacher_reference_number.description: The Teacher Reference Number (TRN) for this NPQ participant

teacher_reference_number_validated.description: Indicates whether the Teacher Reference Number (TRN) has been validated

works_in_school.description: Indicates whether the participant is currently employed by school

employer_name.description: The name of current employer of the participant if not currently employed by school

employment_role.description: Participant's current role in the company they are employed in if not currently employed by school

school_urn.description: The Unique Reference Number (URN) of the school where this NPQ participant is employed

private_childcare_provider_urn.description: The Unique Reference Number (URN) of the private child care provider

school_ukprn.description: The UK Provider Reference Number (UK Provider Reference Number) of the school where this NPQ participant is employed

headteacher_status.description: Indicates whether this NPQ participant is or will be a head teacher

eligible_for_funding.description: Indicates whether this NPQ participant would be eligible for funding from the DfE

funding_choice.description: Indicates how this NPQ participant has said they will funded their training

course_identifier.description: The NPQ course this NPQ application relates to

status.description: The current state of the NPQ application

created_at.description: The date the application was created

updated_at.description: The date the application was last updated

ineligible_for_funding_reason.description: Indicates why this NPQ participant is not eligible for DfE funding

cohort.description: Indicates which call-off contract would fund this participant's training. 2021 indicates a participant that has started, or will start, their training in the 2021/22 academic year. Once a provider accepts an application, they may change a participant's cohort up until the point of submitting a started declaration.

targeted_delivery_funding_eligibility.description: Whether or not this application is eligible for Targeted Delivery Funding uplift

teacher_catchment.description:
This field will indicate whether or not the participant is UK-based.
  • If true then the registration relates to a participant who is UK-based.
  • If false then the registration relates to a participant who is not UK-based.

teacher_catchment_iso_country_code.description: This field identifies which non-UK country the participant has registered from. The API uses ISO 3166 alpha-3 codes, three-letter codes published by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) to represent countries, dependent territories, and special areas of geographical interest.

lead_mentor.description: This field indicates whether the applicant is an ITT lead mentor.

itt_provider.description: This field contains the legal name of the ITT accredited provider from the list of providers.

schedule_identifier.description: The new schedule of the participant

NPQApplicationAlreadyRejected.description: NPQ Application has already been rejected

enum: NPQ Application has already been rejected
title.example: NPQ Application has already been rejected

detail.example: You cannot reject this NPQ application as it has already been rejected

NPQApplicationChangedFromAccepted.description: Once accepted an application cannot change state

enum: Once accepted an application cannot change state
title.example: Once accepted an application cannot change state

detail.example: You cannot reject this NPQ application as it has already been accepted

NPQApplicationsFilter.description: Filter NPQ applications to return more specific results

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

cohort.description: Return only NPQ applications from the specified cohort or cohorts. This is a comma delimited string of years.

participant_id.description: Return only NPQ applications from the specified participant or participants. This is comma delimited string of participant IDs

npq_application_id.description: The ID of the NPQ application that was accepted to create this enrolment

clawback_statement_id.description: Unique id of the statement to which the declaration will be clawed back on, if any

ineligible_for_funding_reason.description: If the declaration is ineligible, the reason why

mentor_id.description: Unique ID of the ECT's mentor

uplift_paid.description: If participant is eligible for uplift, whether it has been paid as part of this declaration

evidence_held.description: The type of evidence that the lead provider holds on their platform to demonstrate that the participant has met the retention criteria for the current milestone period

has_passed.description: Whether the participant has failed or passed

lead_provider_name.description: The name of the provider that submitted the declaration

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

NPQParticipantWithdrawRequest.description: The withdrawal request for an NPQ participant

NPQWithdrawal.description: The details of an NPQ Participant withdrawal

reason.description: The reason a participant was withdrawn

date.description: The date and time the participant was withdrawn

NotFoundResponse.description: The requested resource was not found

title.description: The title of the error message

errors.title: The requested resource was not found
errors.detail: Nothing could be found for the provided details

detail.example: This partnership cannot be created as it has already partnered with another provider

Pagination.description: This schema used to paginate through a collection.

page.description: The page number to paginate to in the collection. If no value is specified it defaults to the first page.

per_page.description: The number items to display on a page. Defaults to 100. Maximum is 3000, if the value is greater that the maximum allowed it will fallback to 3000.

id.description: The unique identifier of the participant declaration record

ParticipantDeclarationAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with a participant declaration response

participant_id.description: The unique id of the participant

course_identifier.description: The type of course the participant is enrolled in

state.description: Indicates the state of this payment declaration

updated_at.description: The date the declaration was last updated

delivery_partner_id.description: Unique ID of the delivery partner associated with the participant at the time the declaration was created

statement_id.description: Unique ID of the statement the declaration will be paid as part of

clawback_statement_id.description: Unique id of the statement to which the declaration will be clawed back on, if any

ineligible_for_funding_reason.description: If the declaration is ineligible, the reason why

mentor_id.description: Unique ID of the ECT's mentor

uplift_paid.description: If participant is eligible for uplift, whether it has been paid as part of this declaration

evidence_held.description: The type of evidence that the lead provider holds on their platform to demonstrate that the participant has met the retention criteria for the current milestone period

has_passed.description: Whether the participant has failed or passed

lead_provider_name.description: The name of the provider that submitted the declaration

ParticipantDeclarationsFilter.description: Filter participant declarations to return more specific results

cohort.description: Return participant declarations associated to the specified cohort or cohorts. This is a comma delimited string of years.

participant_id.description: Return participant declarations associated to the specified participant ID. This is a comma delimited string where multiple participant IDs can be specified

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

delivery_partner_id.description: Return participant declarations associated to the specified delivery partner or delivery partners. This is a comma delimited string of delivery partner IDs.

ECFParticipantFilter.description: Filter a list of records to return more specific results

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

cohort.description: Return only records for the given cohort

training_status.description: Return only records that have this training status

from_participant_id.description: Return only records that have this from Participant ID

NPQParticipantFilter.description: Filter a list of records to return more specific results

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

training_status.description: Return only records that have this training status

from_participant_id.description: Return only records that have this from Participant ID

NPQOutcomeFilter.description: Filter NPQ outcomes to return more specific results

created_since.description: Return only records that have been created since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

detail.example: Partnership with school 123456 for cohort 2022 and delivery partner d1027b7f-664d-48bb-8b9f-c378116d8a16 already exists

PartnershipsFilter.description: Filter partnerships to return more specific results

cohort.description: Return partnerships within the specified cohorts. This is a comma delimited string of years.

updated_since.description: Return only partnerships that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

delivery_partner_id.description: Return partnerships associated to the specified delivery partner or delivery partners. This is a comma delimited string of delivery partner IDs.

SchoolFundingError.description: School is not eligible for DfE-funded FIP

enum: School is not eligible for DfE-funded FIP
title.example: School is not eligible for DfE-funded FIP

detail.description: Additional info why school is not for DfE-funded FIP if any

SingleParticipantDeclarationResponse.description: A confirmation that the participant declaration has been recorded successfully

id.description: The unique identifier of the financial statement

StatementAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with a financial statement

month.description: The month which appears on the statement in the DfE portal

year.description: The calendar year which appears on the statement in the dfe portal

cohort.description: The cohort - 2021 or 2022 - which the statement funds

cut_off_date.description: The milestone cut off or review point for the statement

payment_date.description: The date we expect to pay you for any declarations attached to the statement, which are eligible for payment

paid.description: Indicates whether the DfE has paid providers for any declarations attached to the statement

created_at.description: The date the statement was created

updated_at.description: The date the statement was last updated

StatementsFilter.description: Filter statements to return more specific results

cohort.description: Return statements associated to the specified cohort or cohorts. This is a comma delimited string of years.

type.description: Return statements of a given type

updated_since.description: Return only records that have been updated since this date and time (ISO 8601 date format)

UnfundedMentor.description: Note, this is a new endpoint. The details of an unfunded mentor

id.description: The unique identifier of the mentor record

UnfundedMentorAttributes.description: The data attributes associated with an unfunded mentor

full_name.description: The full name of this mentor

email.description: The email address registered for this unfunded mentor

teacher_reference_number.description: The Teacher Reference Number (TRN) for this participant

created_at.description: The date and time the unfunded mentor was created

updated_at.description: The date and time the unfunded mentor was last updated

UnauthorisedResponse.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid
